description: Victoria Sin is as beautiful as she is feisty and tough. We welcome newcomer Victoria as she suffers though some tough situations and tight bondage. As a night security guard, she runs across someone who wasn't supposed to be there. Tight bondage and uncontrollable squirting orgasms ensue. Victoria was gorgeous in her first hogtied visit, and so we await her return.
title: Welcome Victoria Sin to her first appearance on Hogtied
